scripts.verify: pnpm -r --filter @starfleet/* run lint && pnpm -r --filter @starfleet/* run test && pnpm -r --filter @starfleet/* run build

scripts.migrate:prod: npm run migrate:test && npm run migrate:promote

scripts.jsdoc:all: find src bin scripts -name '*.js' -type f -not -path '*/node_modules/*' | xargs node scripts/jsdoc-ai.js
